attributes.action: Keep the Council Tax as it is and stop the increase according to what size garage you have or if you have a conservatory etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As of next year,depending on what size garage you have or what view you have out of your window or if you have a conservatory and so many more,you will have a percentage increase on your council tax. HOW MUCH MORE MONEY DO THEY WANT TO KEEP TAKING AWAY FROM US???   Please sign too stop this happening!!!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep the Council Tax as it is and stop the increase according to what size garage you have or if you have a conservatory etc."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12955.asp

Prime Minister's Office
